website_summaries.verdict: The comfort granted by the Ahnu Sugarpine II Waterproof Boot Ripstop has earned a lot of compliments from the reviewing community. Purchasers also recognized its breathable design, grippy outsole, and lightness. However, those in need of a pair that can provide competent water protection should pass on this hiking boot. All in all, day hikers will appreciate the various advantages offered by the Sugarpine II Waterproof Boot Ripstop.
pros: The Ahnu Sugarpine II Waterproof Boot Ripstop has received praise from numerous hikers for its comfortable feel
Its breathability impresses a lot of outdoor enthusiasts
The majority says that this day hiking boot gives sufficient support to the ankles
Hordes of buyers appreciate the traction rendered by this footgear on various types of terrain
This Ahnu day hiking boot does not require a long break-in period, as testified by several wearers
The Sugarprine II Waterproof Boot Ripstop’s lightweight construction is lauded by a few adventurers
cons: A couple of online consumers stated that this Ahnu product isn't successful in preventing water intrusions
According to the minority, the boot’s toe box feels a little too tight and narrow

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewrs have said they run small so order up a size. Very light weight and comfortable. Wore on summer hike, not hot.
customer_reviews.author: Deblee

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying Ahnu boots for the past six years and even though they were bought out by Teva, I can't complain about the comfort and the style. I hike on a daily basis and the boots felt comfortable right out of the box, no breaking in needed. I wear shoes between size 9 and 91/2, but always go with a size 10 in hiking boots. I like the extra bit of room so my toes don't hit the front of the boot on a downhill.
customer_reviews.author: tes

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I decided to treat myself to new hiking boots after my under armours fell apart, and I’m so happy I went with these. I have a bad ankle and I hike quite a bit so cushioning and protection is what I need. These do not disappoint. My first pair of anhu’s and will continue to check out everything this brand has to offer!
customer_reviews.author: Day

customer_reviews.title: I wear a 8 1/2 regularly but these ran small and I'll need a 9
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these boots. I thought they fit good but as soon as I took them out for a trial they definitely were too small, my poor toes fell asleep. I will have to return them for a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: david henson

customer_reviews.title: ordered 1/2 size up and too small
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of 8.5 size that I bought 8 yrs ago. ordered a 9 in these and too tight, made my foot numb on a hike glad I was able to return. I measured against the 8.5 and same length and width h this is a great brand and I loved the ones I bought 8 yrs ago, the rubber bumper on front is coming lose and collects rocks and dirt, maybe a shoe repair place can fix them otherwise they are in great shape still. wish I could get another pair with a little more room. 9.5 out of stock.
customer_reviews.author: Ravenbat

customer_reviews.title: Great quality hiking boots
customer_reviews.text: I really like this boots from the very start I opened the box. The color looks great and the quality is good. I tried it on and it’s very comfortable. I’m usually 6 & 1/2 and I ordered 7 because I need to wear thicker socks.l , and it fits perfect. I’m surprise on how comfortable and how good it looks. I’m looking forward to hike with this boots.
customer_reviews.author: Maricar Mauricio

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof stopped after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: Started out great, then about 5 months in, started leaking. Not heavily used, just walking around dew soaked lawns and some muddy pastures. I had bought it specificaly for protection to walk through low levels of snow. These would give me wet cold feet while hiking. Very very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Megan McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Stuff uppers
customer_reviews.text: Very stiff uppers, especially in comparison to their first style. Although I love the colors, I returned. Could be good if you’re looking for a strong sturdy boot but would need some breaking in. Also narrow in the toe.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia M.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite! Perfect for weak ankles.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best boots for my feet, bar none. Great arch support, perfect ankle support, fantastic soles that last. I keep them for about two years with daily wear, heat, rain, or snow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Follow up on earlier review RE: non slippery sole
customer_reviews.text: After wearing these a few weeks and giving a rave review, I am concerned about the soles being non-skid. Nearly slipped on a freshly mopped floor and a small bit of black ice on the porch. Have not tested on mountain scree yet. Will report back after the first spring hike.
customer_reviews.author: Wild Rose

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got these and after testing them for quite some time . I have to say they're worth it. Not only they keep my feet toasty warm, they're lightweight, stylish and waterproof. As for ice, my footing kind of slipped a little but not to the point where I would lost my balance and fell. I've gotten so many compliments on them. I purchased them in the size 8 so I can use thick socks with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jax O.

customer_reviews.title: I hope they never stop making these!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable pair of shoes that I’ve ever bought. I went on a 4 mile hike with these right out of the box, they needed no breaking in and my feet didn’t hurt or feel tired by the end of the hike at all. I’ve put over 20 miles on them so far and I love them! I own a home restoration and design company and I started using these as work boots because they are the only shoes that I can wear all day without my feet hurting and feeling tired!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: The best hiking shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these boots! I bought Columbia boots a few years ago for a hiking trip to Ireland, and a couple of my friends bought these instead. I was so jealous of them the whole trip. They’re so good looking and comfortable. I finally decided to get myself a pair since I’ve need hiking a lot, and they’re just as amazing as I hoped. Highly recommend! I’m usually an 8 and bought an 8. Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Megatron

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wore these around the house to break them in. The shoe part is comfortable, but the ankle part of the boot is stiff. I like these boots, so I just don't lace them all the way up. I leave the top loop unlaced. If you're OK with that, then get them. If you can't do that, don't get them. They definitely will bother your ankles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best boot ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these boots I’ve bought. I use the first pair to walk more than 600 miles over 6 weeks and I never got a single blister. They are lightweight, waterproof, and very comfortable. The sole isn’t slippery. They’re the perfect hiking boot!
customer_reviews.author: HANK

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Supportive
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd pair. I had these before and lasted forever with everyday wear. My feet run wide and these give enough room. I add an arch support. Keep my feet dry through puddles. mud snow and slush. At end of day, I sit and relax, and forget to take my shoes off.
customer_reviews.author: Amdar

customer_reviews.title: So bummed, the originals were awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I expected a decline in quality after Ahnu was bought by Teva...but I was still hopeful that they would be almost as good. They're not. They're cheap and stiff. I would have replaced the originals every year or 2 for the rest of my life...but sadly, these will be my last pair.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Ahnu will be missed.
customer_reviews.text: Glad to have found these as ahnu seems to have been bought out and don't care for teva. One tiny imperfection but for the price and the fact that I was lucky to get this I'll live with it. These are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Gobi55

customer_reviews.title: Ran Smaller than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement pair of ahnu boots that I have loved and worn for years. I bought the same size and found these to be just slightly too small to keep and wear. Returning was very easy through Amazon, but re-ordering meant a big difference in price to go up 1 size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not like the old Ahnu boots
customer_reviews.text: I have old Ahnu Sugarpine waterproof boots which I have worn 3-4 winters. They are very comfortable. Teva Sugarpine boots are nothing like them. These go higher at the ankles and the ankle support feels unbearably rigid. Teva bought and ruined a good brand.
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but too tight for me
customer_reviews.text: Super great quality but unfortunately has to return because it is too narrow and snug for me. I usually size 6, so I ordered both 6 and 6.5, but neither worked for me. Length is ok for 6.5, but I have thicker feet so it feels too tight.
customer_reviews.author: ice cloud

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I wanted...😢
customer_reviews.text: It was a good fit with room for thicker socks. The shoe is too stiff though and feels bulkier than I had expected. My feet kept sliding forward and got concerned about blisters. But my main issue is the stiffness. Not sure how that softens up over time....
customer_reviews.author: Lady M.

customer_reviews.title: So far, ok
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a lightweight shoe that would keep my feet dry and warm. So far I’ve worn them for walking around several sites around Côte d’Azure in November. It’s cold and has been raining and they’ve held up as expected. The only negative comment so far is that they were slippery when walking on wet stone in Èze; I had to look for something or someone to hold on to. But aside from that they’re comfy, but definitely go up a size.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Ramer Mesen

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing these around the house to wear them in and they are pretty darned comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sondra

customer_reviews.title: These are fabulous hiking boots! Extremely comfortable and a joy to hike in!
customer_reviews.text: Get a size larger than you normally wear! These boots are outstanding! I put them on out of the box to hike around in Tuscany Italy. Went 5 miles on cobblestones the first day out with no break in. The support and comfort are unsurpassed! I’ve had a lot of hiking boots in my lifetime including handmade custom Limmer’s and these boots are among the best I’ve worn.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K.

customer_reviews.title: They are a knock off!
customer_reviews.text: The product its a knock off, I compared the boots with the originals at the store and they are completely different! Besides the boots aren't waterproof my feet are soaking wet. Spend your money somewhere else, these boots are not worth it. I also compare them with my previous anhu boots and even do they are pretty beat up because of the wear and tear of 3 years they are in better condition than these.
customer_reviews.author: cariñosa

customer_reviews.title: Would be great but...
customer_reviews.text: Totally waterproof and very comfortable, but inside of left heel seems to be coming unglued under lining which is huge disappointment since I liked them so well otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Joanna L. Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Boots
customer_reviews.text: I hiked a pair of Ahnu boots to death. After trying another brand, I realized I just wanted what I had. Looks like this brand might be getting phased out though. So far, these were comfy for an 8 mile hike and a few shorter hikes. I had to size up half a size for a good fit, so sizing for this brand isn't consistent.
customer_reviews.author: suspiria

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great! This is my 2nd pair. They definitely keep my feet dry and are confortable. I just had to buy a second pair to leave in my camper!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually a size 6 so I suggest you do get a size bigger like everyone said. I got a size 7, went to sequoia park the boots fit well, comfortable, light weight and of course I love the style so satisfy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes, as most hiking shoes are pretty unattractive. These were a good mix and very good quality I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Ktipps

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great hiking boot. Comfortable right out of the box. Lightweight and they really are waterproof!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila R

customer_reviews.title: Please bring back the old style!!
customer_reviews.text: Why mess with success? I’ve been buying these boots for several years because of the comfort, flexibility and looks. I delivered mail for several years while wearing these because they were so lightweight and comfortable. I’m sooooo disappointed with the new style. They hurt my ankles so bad that I can’t wear them. Now after all here years, I have to shop for a different boot. So sad
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a very sturdy comfortable boot.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my niece. It’s a very good looking boot. It IS waterproof. She says it is comfortable and likes it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: Opened box wow great they are perfect, try left one im in love, put right one one I can't tie it. The shoe is missing the buckle hooks. So bummed out, were a gift for my wife ended up returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best boots that feel like a tennis shoe
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and look good. Love these and can walk in them all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hiking boots
customer_reviews.text: These are great lightweight hiking boots they fit my foot well and are very supportive.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Best hiking boots wver
customer_reviews.text: There’s are my absolute favorite hiking boots! They are light and comfortable and protect my feet and ankles in very vigorous hikes! I swear by these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Myah Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Happy feet
customer_reviews.text: These were a replacement for the same boot base that was hiked to pieces over several years. I'm sure I'll get several years of happy feet out of these
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Little Stiff But They Do the Job
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I do a lot of walking but needed something when the weather turned really wet. These are better than OK, but I keep the ankles tied loosely because I find them a little stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Oshier

customer_reviews.title: Stiff fitting, good support!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this boot. If you suffer with weak ankles, like I do, it’s a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Donna H. Miller

customer_reviews.title: My second pair (different color)! Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Great for walking the dog in Wisconsin during the winter!
customer_reviews.author: LSoto

customer_reviews.title: Love the boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! I am a dog walker the boots are very light and keep my feet very warm. They are very comfortable and their light weight makes it very easy to walk for miles!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Ahnus are the most comfortable hiking boots in existence, for real. I love these!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer W

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, flimsy laces
customer_reviews.text: They’re comfy and cute, but I the laces are way cheaper and flimsier than my old Ahnu boots before Teva bought them. My main problem is the laces comes untied literally all the time. But other than that I like wearing them for the winter.
customer_reviews.author: lizzy s.

customer_reviews.title: RUNS small.  The boots seem great like some Ahnu tennis shoes I purchased previously that fit fine.
customer_reviews.text: I received the boots at one location and went back home and when I returned I had missed the return date. So I guess I am stuck with trying to sell them to someone.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The fit is exactly as expected. I love the style and they are very comfortable waterproof shoes
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Blue Sky

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love LOVE love them ! True to size and so cute ! Totally worth the money. Perfect !
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Perfecto 👍
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I live in Co and hike with no problems Very comfortable and excellent support
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Esqueda

customer_reviews.title: Great quality & waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Great hiking shoe. Waterproof. Comfortable. Durable. Good ankle support. Recommend buying a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Janowski

customer_reviews.title: Love! Order size up.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. So lightweight. Good support. Usually wear 8.5, ordered 9.5 and fits perfectly. Love all black color with a touch if green.
customer_reviews.author: IUHoosier_1992

customer_reviews.title: Super lightweight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these before I went to Colorado. Did some light hiking because they weren’t broken in, no worries! Super light and extremely comfortable with room for heavier socks!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L Inglis

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected. Waterproof and comfortable. There was no “breaking in” period before they were comfortable
customer_reviews.author: BrittoninAlabama

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable as I would have liked. I have bad feet.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chiulli

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for school wear all day!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old daughter loves them. Comfortable enough to wear all day in school. Very sturdy and truly waterproof
customer_reviews.author: Carey Aquino

customer_reviews.title: Best Hiking Boots
customer_reviews.text: Best boots ever, this is the 3rd pair I bought. Best price in town.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Cochrain

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: In the beginning they're a little uncomfortable but once they're broken in they are amazing. Love how they are waterproof
customer_reviews.author: Damaris Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Ahnu sugarpine hikers
customer_reviews.text: Fit just fine and very comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very comfortable and extremely warm. They are great in cold weather. They’re also waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Schwartzy

customer_reviews.title: These are no break in ready to go hikers I can wear for hours the moment I put them on.
customer_reviews.text: My second pair. I will automatically order again the next time I need new ones.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Boo Ahnu
customer_reviews.text: It was received defective (rivet fell out immediately) and no replacement available.
customer_reviews.author: Chantel Ruckh

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable felt great out of the box. Perfect fit. Very impressed. Would recommend and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Ahnu Women's W Sugarpine Ii Wp Boot Ripstop Hiking
product_meta.description: With closed mesh and a suede upper, this classic hiker keeps you comfortable no matter the terrain. A true best seller in the Ahnu by Teva collection, the Sugarpine ii ripstop wp boot keeps your foot extra stable on challenging terrain with innovative Ahnu Numentum® hike technology.
feature_bullets: Closed mesh and suede upper keeps your feet cool and comfortable.
Aegis Antimicrobial construction sheds bacteria, grit and grime to keep things fresh.
Custom Vibram Outsole provides optimal traction in a variety of environments
